counters.name: Oracle
counters.appliesTo: hasCategory("AWS/RDS") && ( system.aws.engine == "oracle-ee" || system.aws.engine == "oracle-se" || system.aws.engine == "oracle-se1" || system.aws.engine == "oracle-se2") && join(system.groups, ",") == "##defaultResourceGroup##"

counters.name: SQLServer
counters.appliesTo: hasCategory("AWS/RDS") && ( system.aws.engine == "sqlserver-ee" || system.aws.engine == "sqlserver-se" || system.aws.engine == "sqlserver-ex" || system.aws.engine == "sqlserver-web") && join(system.groups, ",") == "##defaultResourceGroup##"
